casebody.data:
Joseph P. LOPINTO, III, Sheriff of the Parish of Jefferson (as Successor in Office to Harry Lee) and Jefferson Law Enforcement District
v.
PROFESSIONAL CONSTRUCTION SERVICES, INC. and Swager Communications, Inc. NO. 2018-CC-1339 Supreme Court of Louisiana. November 5, 2018 Denied. CLARK, J., would grant.

CRICHTON, J., would grant.
